#summary TelluriumWorks 0.8.0 RC1: A Tellurium DSL Script Runner.
#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Support

= Introduction =

TelluriumWorks is a Java Swing IDE to run Tellurium test script, which is a Groovy DSL script. Tellurium script can be generated by [http://code.google.com/p/aost/wiki/TelluriumIde080RC1 Tellurium IDE]. TelluriumWorks is implemented using [http://griffon.codehaus.org/ Griffon]: A Grails-like Rich Client Framework.

= Usage =

First, download TelluriumWorks from [http://aost.googlecode.com/files/TelluriumWorks-0.8.0-RC1.zip here]. Unzip and then run the application with the following command:

{{{
java -jar telluriumworks.jar
}}}
